goal.tools.mc.program.goal

Class GOALConversionUniverse

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.mc.program.goal.GOALConversionUniverse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GOALConversionUniverse
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a conversion universe for GOAL, such that BitSets can be quickly converted to mental states and vice versa.
    Author:
    sungshik, W.Pasman made serializable #2246
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public GOALConversionUniverse()

    • Method Detail

      • addIfNotContains

        public int addIfNotContains(GOALConversionElement element)
        Adds specified element to this conversion universe if the element is not already contained. In this latter case, the index of the existing element is returned. Otherwise, the index of the added element is returned.
        Parameters:
        element - - The element to be added.
        Returns:
        The index at which the element is registered in the universe.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(GOALConversionElement element)
        Checks if the specified element is contained in this conversion universe.
        Parameters:
        element - - The element to be (or not to be) contained.
        Returns:
        true if the element is contained; false otherwise.

      • getAtIndex

        public GOALConversionElement getAtIndex(int index)
        Get the conversion element at the specified index. If preassigned element indices are in use, and this index is valid there, but the element at this index has not occurred yet (so does not exist in the elements list), then the returned value is null.
        Parameters:
        index - - The index of the requested element.
        Returns:
        The requested element.

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex(GOALConversionElement elem)
        Determine the index of specified element.
        Parameters:
        elem - - The element to determine the index of.
        Returns:
        The index corresponding to the element if has already been indexed; -1 otherwise.

      • nFocusses

        public int nFocusses()
        Get the maximum number of focus names, namely by counting all focuses at all different depths. This is an upper bound to the actual number of different focuses, as the same focus can occur at different depths.
        Returns:
        The number of focus names.

      • size

        public int size()
        Determine the size of this universe.
        Returns:
        The size of this universe.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • setPreassignedIndices

        public void setPreassignedIndices(java.util.List<java.lang.String> elements)
        Set preassigned indices for elements. Any new element that matches a string in this array will be assigned the position index of that element in this array. Must be called prior to adding any GOALConversionElement elements to this universe.
        Parameters:
        elements -

      • toStringArray

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> toStringArray()
